job.title: Application Engineer
job.description: Client located just west of Chicago is looking for an Applications engineer in the automation industry. This individual will have experience with automated systems primarily in the Material Handling field. This individual will be the technical liaison between sales and the customer. Salary will be based on experience. location: Melrose Park, Illinois job type: Permanent salary: $70,000 - 100,000 per year work hours: 8am to 4pm education: Bachelors Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.
